instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Manrope' for all headings and 'Inter' for body text. Import them via Google Fonts in index.css.
The app is MAP-FIRST. The map should occupy the full viewport (h-screen w-screen).
Use the 'CartoDB Positron' tile layer for a clean, utility look that makes pins pop.
Pins should be circular images with a white border. Use the provided image URLs as sample data for pins.
The 'Post Item' flow should be a Bottom Sheet (Drawer) that slides up over the map.
Do not build a complex sidebar. Use a simple top bar with a transparent/glass background for the logo and a 'Menu' button.
Use the 'sonner' library for toast notifications (e.g., 'Item posted successfully').
For the Admin Panel, use a simple PIN entry screen (0-9 keypad) before showing the dashboard.
Ensure the 'Report' modal is simple: a list of reasons and a submit button.
Use 'lucide-react' for all icons (MapPin, Plus, AlertTriangle, Menu, X, Check).
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry where possible, but keep this app functional.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy (Map < Controls < Sheet < Modal).
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for floating controls.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, entrance animations.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable inside the bottom sheet content.
All interactive and key informational elements MUST include a `data-testid` attribute.
